extensionDescription.message: Tycho is a tool for moderated end user tests. This is the client component that runs as a browser add-on.

susQ1.message: I think that I would like to use this system frequently

susQ2.message: I found the system unnecessarily complex

susQ3.message: I thought the system was easy to use

susQ4.message: I think that I would need the support of a technical person to be able to use this system

susQ5.message: I found the various functions in this system were well integrated

susQ6.message: I thought there was too much inconsistency in this system

susQ7.message: I would imagine that most people would learn to use this system very quickly

susQ8.message: I found the system very cumbersome to use

susQ9.message: I felt very confident using the system

susQ10.message: I needed to learn a lot of things before I could get going with this system
